settings.family_intro_text: Along with nylon and vinyl, Tenacious Tape now sticks to silicone-treated fabrics. Simply peel-and-stick our Silnylon Patches to repair a hole in ultralight silnylon tents, tarps, and more. Backed by a silicone-based adhesive, the Silnylon Patches won’t let you down.
settings.family_tip_text: When strapped for time, apply a Tenacious Tape Repair Patch on top of Aquaseal FD or Seam Grip WP for quicker, in-field repairs.
